Mud Island Park

Open dawn to dusk.

This equates to 6am-6pm in winter, 6am-8pm in summer.

Get Here

Access Mud Island Park on foot from Island Drive or by walking across the skybridge from downtown.

View on Map

Parking

Paid parking available in the River Parks Garage at Poplar and Front St.

Mud Island Amphitheatre

Opened event days only; time varies by event.

Get Here

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

View on Map

Admission

Mud Island Amphitheatre Tickets are sold by event on Ticketmaster.

Get Tickets

Parking

Parking is available at the Mud Island Parking Garage adjacent to the East Plaza Entrance which is located at 125 N. Front Street. Entrance to the garage is at the corner of Front St. and Poplar. Fees range from $3-$10, depending on the event.
